msbt.message: Oh, you found the treasure finally. I'll just take that off your hands for the next time, .
I was really rooting for you. Sorry time ran out, but thanks for bringing it back anyway!

Thank goodness you're OK! I feared the worst, .Whatever happened, it interrupted our treasure hunt. I was so sure you could do it tooI want to give you another try, but let's wait until my nerves settle down first. Sorry, .
